description: Tower upgrade. Existing EE/H3G 11.7m High Alifabs Phase 4 Streetworks Monopole on root foundation c/w Alifabs Diplexor Box at base to be removed and existing root foundation to be left in situ. Proposed EE/H3G 17.0m High Phase 8 Monopole c/w Wrap-Around Cabinet to be installed on proposed concrete base c/w proposed H3G 6No. Passive Routers, 3No. Filters & Combined BOB. Proposed H3G 3No. Kathrein Antennas & 3No. Ericsson Air 6449 to be mounted on proposed Phase 8 Monopole c/w proposed EE/H3G 3No. MHAs. Proposed H3G 1No. GPS Node to be installed on top of proposed 17.0m Monopole using standard mounting kit. Existing Alifabs H3g Pogona Cabinet fixed on existing concrete base c/w H1800 RF Modules, 2No. Flatpack Rectifiers (2KW) & 1No. Smartpack Controller to be removed & existing root foundation to be left in situ. Proposed H3G 6130 Cabinet to be installed on proposed concrete foundation c/w proposed H3G BBUs & PSU. Proposed H3G Link AC Mk5 Cabinet on root foundation to accommodate proposed TX. Proposed H3G Bowler Cabinet to be mounted on proposed concrete foundation c/w proposed 9No. H3G ERS and associated works as illustrated on the enclosed drawings.
site_name: T-mobile 51112 Mast North Countess Road, E17 5HT
